Props.Name: Class
Props.Description: The class applied to the outermost element of the component

Props.Name: Color
Props.Description: Applies specified color to the control - it can be the name of material color (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)).

Props.Name: Rounded
Props.Description: Designates the border-radius applied to the component.

Props.Name: Style
Props.Description: The style applied to the outermost element of the component

Props.Name: Width
Props.Description: Sets the width for the component.
